price: (64) Indeed, that is truth [i.e., reality] - the quarreling of the people of the Fire.
arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
